title: Russian strike hits Kyiv shortly after UN chief toured capital; Zelenskyy says he was nearly captured by Russians: Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Russian strike hits Kyiv shortly after UN chief toured capital; Zelenskyy says he was nearly captured by Russians: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. April 28, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news  CNN
  3. Rockets hit Ukrainian capital Kyiv as UN chief visits the city – BBC News  BBC News
  4. Margarita Simonyan, Top Kremlin Mouthpiece, Says Russia Is Being Forced Into Using Nukes in Ukraine  The Daily Beast
  5. Russia does not consider itself at war with NATO, blames Kyiv for talks deadlock - agencies  Reuters
contentSnippet:
Russian strike hits Kyiv shortly after UN chief toured capital; Zelenskyy says he was nearly captured by Russians: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
April 28, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news  CNN
Rockets hit Ukrainian capital Kyiv as UN chief visits the city – BBC News  BBC News
Margarita Simonyan, Top Kremlin Mouthpiece, Says Russia Is Being Forced Into Using Nukes in Ukraine  The Daily Beast
Russia does not consider itself at war with NATO, blames Kyiv for talks deadlock - agencies  Reuters

localize.title: 国連総長が首都を視察した直後にロシアの攻撃がキエフを直撃、ゼレンスキーはロシア軍に捕まりそうになったと語る。ウクライナの最新情報
在联合国负责人巡视首都后不久，俄罗斯袭击了基辅；泽伦斯基说他差点被俄罗斯人抓住。乌克兰实时更新
在聯合國負責人巡視首都後不久，俄羅斯襲擊了基輔；澤倫斯基說他差點被俄羅斯人抓住。烏克蘭實時更新
